Products.q: How diverse is your product range in terms of designs and styles?
Products.a: We offer a wide variety of lighting fixtures, from classic to modern styles, to suit any interior design.

Products.q: What types of lighting fixtures do you offer?
Products.a: We provide a full range of lighting fixtures such as ceiling lights, pendant lights, wall lights, table lamps, floor lamps, recessed lights, and more.

Products.q: What materials are your lights made of?
Products.a: Our lights are made from a variety of materials including iron, copper, glass, fabric, and wood, ensuring high quality and durability.

Products.q: What type of bulbs are compatible with your lights?
Products.a: We recommend using energy-efficient LED bulbs for our lights.

Products.q: Do your lights come with a warranty?
Products.a: All our products come with a [warranty period] warranty to ensure customer satisfaction.

Pricing.q: Are your prices the best in the market?
Pricing.a: We are committed to providing quality products at competitive prices. Additionally, we frequently offer attractive promotions.

Pricing.q: Is there any room for negotiation on the prices?
Pricing.a: We are always open to discussing your pricing needs.

Purchasing and Payment.q: How can I place an order?
Purchasing and Payment.a: You can place an order directly at our store, through our website, or by contacting us by phone.

Purchasing and Payment.q: What payment methods do you accept?
Purchasing and Payment.a: We accept cash, bank cards, and bank transfers.
Delivery time depends on the product and delivery address. We will inform you of the specific delivery time when you place your order.

Installation.a: Yes, we provide professional installation services.
The installation cost will be quoted based on the specific project.

Other Questions.q: How do I clean and maintain my lights?
Other Questions.a: We will provide detailed instructions on how to clean and maintain each type of light.

Other Questions.q: Can I return a product if I'm not satisfied?
Other Questions.a: We have a [number of days] return policy if the product is defective or not as described.
